children.name: IntgE2wPosFileTransInsA
children.description:
Load Integration E2W Product Activity Data Link Table

Sourcing step 1 : Create records from time dimension for customer who has submitted POS records 
Cross join of Gregorian calendar
Sets IN_FILE_EXPECTED by default logic from Sunday before first receipt to Max(date) in Gregorian calendar.

children.name: IntgE2wPosFileTransUpdA
children.description:
Sourcing step 3 :
update IN_FILE_EXPECTED from customer calendar.
Part 1 – update yes to No
When a record exists with IN_FILE_EXPECTED = ‘Yes’ and an incoming record in Excel has ‘No’ then invalidate current and insert new record with updated value.
Part 2 – update no to yes
When a record exists with IN_FILE_EXPECTED = ‘No’ and the incoming Excel has no entry for that customer/date and the date is not for a Sat or sun then invalidate current and insert new record with IN_FILE_EXPECTED = ‘Yes’. ONLY UPDATES THE CURRENT YEAR

children.name: IntgE2wPosFileTransUpdB
children.description:
Sourcing step 4 :
Load Integration E2W Product Activity Data Link Table.
update IN_FILE_RECEIVED from customer calendar.
When a record exists with IN_FILE_RECEIVED = ‘No’ and it is received in POS. Invalidate the existing record and insert a new record with IN_FILE_RECEIVED = ‘Yes’


Aug 19 2020 - added Insert component and modified  update component to invalidate records
Aug 21 2022 - Change DT_VALID_UNTIL filter to " > CURRENT_DATE + 1"
